biotools.summary: The TraceTrack application serves for automatic batch analysis of Sanger sequencing trace files. It accepts a set of trace files and a reference file, performs alignments of trace sequences to corresponding reference sequences and displays an overview of resulting alignments.

bioschemas.name: TraceTrack
bioschemas.summary: The TraceTrack application serves for automatic batch analysis of Sanger sequencing trace files. It accepts a set of trace files and a reference file, performs alignments of trace sequences to corresponding reference sequences and displays an overview of resulting alignments.
